product_name: Mountainsmith Travel Duffel - Large - 2013 Special Buy
long_description: The simple, spacious design of the Mountainsmith Large Travel duffel hauls your gear from point A to point B with ease. Durable nylon fabric stands up to wear and tear. Zippered main compartment opens wide for easy access when packing and unpacking; exterior zippered pocket keeps small items close at hand. Wrapped handles make carrying comfortable; haul handles on ends provide extra carrying power. Compression straps stabilize load. Special buy.
short_description: The simple, spacious design of the Mountainsmith Large Travel duffel hauls your gear from point A to point B with ease.
